section1.titletxt: Smart delivery of materials for complex construction sites

section2.innertxt: Chaos can be an amazing creative force, raising new buildings from dust.Chaos causes accidents, delays and losses. It makes projects stressful and frustrating.This means that you really have no control over the situation.

cards.innertxt: Effective projects cost less and are completed on time.

section3.title: It's time to clean up your construction site and take control of your project.
section3.innertxt: We care about deliveries to the construction site and the people who count on them
section3.txt: We know all about pride from a shiny new building. We also know all about the frustration of trying to complete a project on time and on budget.

section5.title: What is StroyKontrol?
section5.innertitle: StroyKontrol is an intelligent delivery management system that provides information and control of materials on complex construction sites in real time.

section6.row1Title: Track delivery throughout the supply chain
section6.row1txt: From supplier to subcontractor, you always know where your materials are, making routine waste a thing of the past and reducing on-site accidents.
section6.row2Title: Optimize and control your arrival on site
section6.row2txt: Delivery vehicles arrive at fixed intervals at pre-designated bays where unloading equipment is ready and waiting for them.
section6.row3Title: Take control of your data in real time
section6.row3txt: Intelligent reporting gives you the power to make decisions based on how things are right now. No more manual concrete pouring reports or checking 10,000 monthly invoices, it's all available online without any effort.

section7.title: Delivery made easier
section7.innertxt: We take care of all your various deliveries and their many specialized unloading requirements.

section8.row1Card1txt: Concrete deliveries are precisely planned and its condition is monitored, ensuring the fastest possible installation time.
section8.row1Card2txt: Waste is monitored and sorted, and the fullness of containers is digitally tracked.
section8.row1Card3txt: All formwork is tracked from arrival to departure and its condition is controlled, minimizing loss and damage.
section8.row2Card1txt: Prefabricated panels arrive one at a time, their on-site storage is tracked, and their installation is planned and supervised.
section8.row2Card2txt: The fa√ßade elements arrive sequentially, their assembly is controlled and their movement is monitored.
section8.row2Card3txt: Materials arrive on time, tagged and tracked in detail for installation.
section8.row3Card1txt: Scaffolding is tracked from receipt to storage, use and return, so it's always clear what's in place and where.
section8.row3Card2txt: Equipment and operators are guaranteed to be available when needed and their operational status is monitored.
section8.row3Card3txt: Deliveries are made in a precise sequence for complex installation, reducing or eliminating the need for storage.
section8.last: and all other materials that enter or leave your site

section9.title: Reliability
section9.innertxt: With reliable construction, everyone wins - municipalities fulfill their responsibilities to citizens, investors receive certification for their projects, and general contractors gain increased reputation.
section9.card1txt: By optimizing logistics, fewer trips are required, resulting in lower CO2 emissions. CO2 emissions are monitored, allowing you to set targets and make tangible improvements.
section9.card2txt: Waste sorting is simplified, waste disposal is automated, and damaged materials are reused when necessary, reducing costs and encouraging recycling and reuse.
section9.card3txt: Traffic problems and noise pollution are reduced, improving the lives of the local community. Improved material handling and storage means workers are also better protected.

section10.txt: The reliable design of StroyKontrol is included as standard.
